text: ēvāyē piṭa konda mata oba (næga) vāḍi vīma san̆dahā, ē mata oba (tṛptimatva vana andamaṭa) vāḍi vuvahot obagē deviyan pahaḷa kaḷa mema varaprasādaya matak kara, (mē venuven oba ohuva næmada) “mē mata (nægīmaṭa) śaktiyak nomættan vaśayen siṭi apaṭa meya vasan̆ga kara dun aya itāmat pariśuddhavantayeki” yayida
